page.title: 20Television.
page.content: We have 2 national channels B.B.C1 and B.B.C2 and 2 independent channels I.T.V and channel 4. One of the most popular programmes in our class is 'The Young Ones' which is on B.B.C2. Cartoons,films,comedies,news, documentaries programmes and soap operas are some of the types of television programmes. This is what is usually shown on a weekday Breakfast T.V from 6 to 9a.m. with the news every half hour,then progrmmes for the pre-school children are shown until about 11.00a.m,when schools'programmes are shown.At 4p.m. childrens' programmes start and end at 6p.m. with the news.In the evening family programmes are on until 9p.m. From then on adult programmes are shown until closedown at 12.30 a.m.
